ma-alert/size.description: Sets the size of the component

ma-button/tag.description: Sets the HTML tag element of the component

ma-button/rounded.description: Sets the button borders to rounded style

ma-button/loading.description: Sets the button state to loading and this becomes disabled

ma-button/disabled.description: Sets the button state as disabled

ma-datagrid/noResultsText.description: Displayed text when no data is displayed

ma-heading/level.description: Set the HTML element tag to ensure the document semantics are meaningful by specifying its level

ma-heading/size.description: Sets the text element size according to our Design System

ma-heading/tone.description: Sets the text element color tone

ma-icon/icon.description: Sets which icon should be displayed

ma-option/disabled.description: Sets if element should be disabled

ma-option/card.description: Sets element's style to look like a card

ma-pagination/buttonsNumber.description: Sets the amount of page buttons' to be displayed

ma-pagination/totalItems.description: Defines total amount of items to be displayed

ma-pagination/itemsPerPage.description: Defines amount of items that will be displayed per each page

ma-pagination/leftButtonAria.description: Sets left arrow button aria label

ma-pagination/rightButtonAria.description: Sets right arrow button aria label

ma-range/steps.description:
Sets the range steps
.
```ts
  <{
   text: string,
   value: any,
  }[]>
```

ma-select/label.description:
Sets component's label

⚠️ If attribute aria-label is defined, input's label will be 'visually' hidden

ma-select/errorMessage.description: Sets component's error message to display if `hasError === true`

ma-select/hasError.description: Displays or hides error message defined through `errorMessage` property

ma-select/formatter.description:
Formats the given options before rendering them

```ts
formattedOption = {
   disabled: boolean,
   label: string,
   text: string,
   value: string | number | boolean | object
 }
```

ma-select/fieldClass.description: Applies given styling class to component

ma-select/weight.description: Applies given styling class to component

ma-stack/space.description:
Sets the space gap between children.

If an array is passed, values will target the design system breakpoints.
```ts
// This would apply medium on all the different breakpoints
space = 'small'
// This would apply none on mobile, small on tablet and large on desktop
:space="['none', 'small', 'large']"
```

[Spacing tokens documentation](https://holaluz.github.io/margarita/?path=/story/tokens-spacing--page)

ma-stack/align.description:
Sets the children alignment. Defaults to fill.

If an array is passed, values will target the design system breakpoints.
```ts
// This would apply left on all the different breakpoints
align = 'left'
// This would apply fill on mobile, center on tablet and left on desktop
:align="['fill', 'center', 'left']"
```

ma-text/tag.description: Set the HTML element tag to ensure the document semantics are meaningful

ma-text/size.description: Sets the text element size according to our Design System

ma-text/tone.description: Sets the text element color tone

ma-text-field/errorMessage.description: Sets component's error message to display if `hasError === true`

ma-text-field/hasError.description: Displays or hides error message defined through `errorMessage` property

ma-text-field/label.description:
Sets component's label

⚠️ If attribute aria-label is defined, input's label will be 'visually' hidden
